alert.note: Alert for Bradley; East Polk; Hamilton; West Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 10:31PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of freezing drizzle and snow expected to continue through the overnight hours. Additional accumulations should be light. * WHERE...Hamilton, Bradley, West Polk and East Polk Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Any wet roads will likely flash freeze tonight. Black ice is likely and is very dangerous to see, especially at night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; East Polk; Hamilton; West Polk
